document.full_text: japan on tuesday pledged to overhaul regulation of nuclear power, saying that lax standards and poor oversight had contributed to the worst nuclear accident since chernobyl in 1986.
document.title: japan makes new nuclear safety vows after quake
lines_and_colors: japan on tuesday pledged to overhaul regulation of nuclear power, saying that lax standards and poor oversight had contributed to the worst nuclear accident since chernobyl in 1986.
